content.question: In the context of the poem as a whole, a complexity in the speaker’s character is revealed by the inconsistency between his stated desire to “spare my absent Friends the Grief” (line 25) and his

choices.label: disappointment that he has no friends to grieve for or comfort him
preference for professional mourners over heartfelt expressions of grief
forgiveness toward friends who have been unkind to him in the past
rejection of formal ceremonial rites at his funeral

content.answer: disappointment that he has no friends to grieve for or comfort him

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
